author: jbellis
msg: final cleanup of SSTableSliceIterator, now with less unnecessary copying of Columns around
patch by jbellis; reviewed by Jun Rao for CASSANDRA-332

author: jbellis
msg: avoid copying variables to ColumnGroupReader that it can get from the parent class.  rename underscored variables.
patch by jbellis; reviewed by Jun Rao for CASSANDRA-332

author: jbellis
msg: patch by jbellis; reviewed by Jun Rao for CASSANDRA-332

author: jbellis
msg: always write at least one index (with first and last column of the range) for the columns in row.  this vastly simplifies column reading code and makes indexing bugs much more obvious (since there is only one read path each for names / slices now).
patch by jbellis; reviewed by Jun Rao for CASSANDRA-332

author: jbellis
msg: don't serialize unused column count into column index.  remove DataInput/Output round-tripping from ColumnGroupReader
patch by jbellis; reviewed by Jun Rao for CASSANDRA-332
